LanguagData.VS.TargetMustBeMarked: Target must be under the affect of a soul mark.
LanguagData.VS.TargetMustBeAdvancedMarked: Target must be under the affect of an advanced soul mark.
LanguagData.VS.TargetMustNotBeResisting: Target must not be resisting the soul mark.
LanguagData.VS.TargetMustNotBeMarked: Target must not be under the effect of a soul mark.
LanguagData.VS.TargetAlreadyAwakenedMarked: Target is already under the effect of an awakened soul mark.
LanguagData.VS.TargetAlreadyAwakening: Target cannot be experiencing soul mark awakening.
